attributes.action: Get the police to continue inforcing the law makingit a punishable offence to deny acces to both private and public property of cavalier king charles spaniels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this law wasmade punishable with 30 yers inprisonment manyyers ago but the police have stopped inforcing it even though it is still law but this is only the dog not the owner so unless the cavalier is very smart which isunlikely as it is a breed famous for its supidity then there is no way that a criminal can use this law to steal anything so you cannot say that it will cause crime because it wont.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
